verbs.description: [ARG1: another arena] [V: touched] [ARG0: by loss amsterdam] [ARGM-ADV: standing in the first real chill of fall on friday afternoon] a line of mourners stretched up cornell street and down hibbard street from the doors of st stanislaus church waiting hours to enter to pay respects to eight of the victims of the limousine crash that took 20 lives on sunday in schoharie among the eight mourned inside st stanislaus on friday afternoon was adam jackson 34 who was killed in the crash along with his wife three sisters - in - law two brothers - in - law and friends last saturday pat liverio amsterdam strong congressman paul tonko st stanislaus barry rouse football rams st stanislaus church st stanislaus church amsterdam adam jackson jack buck amsterdam rugged rams schoharie
